name: NEW!! 3 HAUNTED ARMORS and a Christmas card (PLUS other goodies)
description: Welcome. Do you own a store and purchase items at a lower rate than individuals so you can sell them to customers at a higher rate? No? Fear not. This option empowers you with the same heavy wallet that stores wield. You can buy three or more books at the special store price of $10 each. The books, as always, come with stickers, a greeting card and a download code for the album NARWHAL. Oh fudge. Feel free to buy in increments of three or if you'd like a renegade number that doesn't agree with three, paypal the appropriate amount to ndenver@hotmail.com

name: HAUNTED ARMOR - Book w/ Album
description:
I have written fifty new 50-word stories and drawn a bunch of new drawings. They will be collected in a high quality, heavy paper, display worthy tome. The drawings look like the best drawings. The stories are each exactly 50-words long and read like this,

<q>The attic and the basement were in love. They exchanged letters and promises of devotion, but try as they might, they couldn’t touch. Save for their love, life was torture. They knew their only hope for contact was a wild giant swinging his axe through the floor that divided them.<q>

name: Nate Denver's Neck / Best Friends Forever Split LP
description:
Info: Our first foray into producing and releasing records. Eight otherwise-unreleased songs from Nate Denver's Neck. Six Best Friends Forever songs recorded by Nate Kinsella at Electrical Audio in Chicago, and previously only available on tour-only cdrs • Hand-printed, hand-assembled gatefold sleeves featuring a centerfold by Luke Holden of Detrimental Information fame • Limited to 500 pressed on thick white vinyl • Manufactured in the Czech Republic

Design: Dan Black & Jessica Seamans 
Illustration: Jessica Seamans & Luke Holden

Tracklist:

Nate Denver's Neck 
01. Move Away 
02. Clock Jitters 
03. Hallelujah 
04. Cheers 
05. Malaysia 
06. On the Road Again 
07. Harvest 
08. God Please

Best Friends Forever 
01. Circus Song 
02. January 
03. Up Up 
04. ULR & D 
05. Be Sharpe 
06. Austin, TX

name: THE PRINCE, THE QUEEN, THE CORPSE. - 10" Record
description:
THE PRINCE, THE QUEEN, THE CORPSE. The 10 minute song about a dancer who is sabotaged by a rival dancer and enlists the help of a demon to exact revenge. Released by ROCK IS HELL (rockishell.com) on 10” orange vinyl, each record comes with one of five denver drawings silk screened on some kind of nice paper. 

Side A is the song.

Side B is the recording of the performance of Swan Lake during which the demon appears.

name: Prepare to Die - CD
description: Buy this or don't, its up to you.
